## ZoteroTool.logOptionsGlobal property

Log options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
logOptionsGlobal: {
        _type: "toolkitlog";
        disableConsole: boolean;
        disableZLog: boolean;
        prefix: string;
    };
```

## Remarks

default:

```ts
{
  disableConsole: false,
  disableZLog: false,
  prefix: "",
}
```
`_type` is for recognization, don't modify it.
